item.title: Multi-Req Portals
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

That’s mine how would i make it be either be 90 Strength or 90 Magic etc…?

[code]case 7315: // PartyHat MiniGame
if(playerLevel[2] >= 90) {
sendMessage(“Finish this minigame for a chance at a rare!”);
teleportToX = 2609;
teleportToY = 3163;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage("Sorry you Suck to bad. Come back when you’re 90

Strength.");
}
break;[/code]
